name: Santa Rockstar
description: SAVE CHRISTMAS WITH THE POWER OF ROCK! Santa needs your help! Take your guitar and rock all around the world, delivering presents in the Merry Christmas Stage Sled with the help of the Reindeer Band. Test your skills in this amazing music game, with incredible rock versions of the best known Christmas Carols.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics card Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Guitar Controller support
